title: Bobby Signed Up For Medical Procedure + Name The Country Artist’s Laugh + Eddie’s Genius Hack Getting Kids To Eat Vegetables
itunes:title: Bobby Signed Up For Medical Procedure + Name The Country Artist’s Laugh + Eddie’s Genius Hack Getting Kids To Eat Vegetables
description:
Bobby revealed that he has signed up for a couple medical procedures to deal with some long standing issues he’s been having. One will happen soon and the other will be much later this year. Can you guess the country artist laughing? We play a clip of a laugh from a famous country artist…just name the artist! Eddie shares his genius hack that worked for getting his foster son to eat lettuce and carrots.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
